mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORTNUM, NUM, BOARDID, REPORTER, REPORTCONTENTS, REPORTDATE, REPORTEDUSER, REPORTRESULT, REPORTEDCONTENTS, REPORTTYPE) VALUES (REPORTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{boardId}, #{reporter}, #{reportContents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{reportedUser}, #{reportResult}, #{reportedContents}, #{reportType})

INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORTNUM, NUM, BOARDID, COMMENTNUM, REPORTER, REPORTCONTENTS, REPORTDATE, REPORTEDUSER, REPORTRESULT, REPORTEDCONTENTS, REPORTTYPE) VALUES (REPORTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{boardId}, #{commentNum}, #{reporter}, #{reportContents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{reportedUser}, #{reportResult}, #{reportedContents}, #{reportType})
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT SET REPORTRESULT = #{reportResult} WHERE REPORTNUM = #{reportNum}
UPDATE STORY SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents} WHERE NUM = #{num}
UPDATE STORYCOMMENT SET CONTENTS = #{contents} WHERE COMMENTNUM = #{commentNum}
